hero.tagline: Our solutions keep pace with your technological progress.

erpFeatures.headline: Every tool your delivery business needs — in one solution
erpFeatures.subheadline: From order entry to invoicing: 13 modules that work together seamlessly and adapt to your workflow.

orders.title: Orders
orders.description: Capture, manage, and track all orders centrally. From receipt to delivery — with real-time status updates.

sales.title: Sales
sales.description: Digitize price lists, quotes, and sales processes. Automatic calculation and seamless handoff to invoicing.

planning.title: Planning
planning.description: Daily planning, capacity overview, and resource allocation at a glance. Optimized for delivery operations with multiple teams.

route.title: Route Planning
route.description: Intelligent route optimization for shorter distances and less fuel. Considers time windows, vehicle capacity, and traffic.

crm.title: CRM
crm.description: Centrally manage customer data, communication history, and preferences. Better service through complete customer overview.

warehouse.title: Warehouse
warehouse.description: Monitor inventory levels in real time, define minimum stock, and trigger automatic reorders.

products.title: Products
products.description: Product catalog with variants, price tiers, and supplier info. Fast search and flexible categorization.

delivery.title: Delivery
delivery.description: Track delivery status in real time, capture proof of delivery digitally, and notify customers automatically.

cashbox.title: Cash Tracking
cashbox.description: Daily cash closing, cash management, and reconciliation with bank transactions. Always know where your money is.

waybillInvoice.title: Waybill & Invoice
waybillInvoice.description: Automatically generate waybills and invoices from orders. GoBD-compliant and ready for your tax advisor.

payments.title: Payment Tracking
payments.description: Monitor open items, automatically match incoming payments, and trigger reminders for overdue amounts.

reporting.title: Reports & Dashboard
reporting.description: Custom dashboards and reports for all business areas. From revenue analytics to driver performance.

expenses.title: Expense Management
expenses.description: Record, categorize, and analyze operating expenses. Fuel, maintenance, personnel — all in one place.

services.headline: Digital Solutions for Your Business
services.subheadline: From custom ERP systems to AI integration – we build software that simplifies your processes.

customProjects.headline: Software That Fits You
customProjects.description: Tailored software solutions for complex business processes. We build exactly what you need – nothing more, nothing less.

customERP.headline: ERP Systems That Grow With You
customERP.description: Forget rigid off-the-shelf software. Our ERP solutions adapt to your business – today and tomorrow.

aiSolutions.headline: Intelligence for Your Data
aiSolutions.description: AI solutions that run on your infrastructure. Local, secure, and specifically designed for European businesses.

footer.companyDescription: Custom software solutions for small and medium enterprises. Developed in Germany, with focus on quality and data privacy.
